text:
Hi,

I find it necessary to allow users to specify JVM arguments (-D...=...) outside
the build script, in a properties file. Without @jvmargs, there is no way to
pass a space-separated list of arguments to <java>. Hence I think @jvmargs
should be considered a kosher alternative to multiple <jvmarg> children, and be
un-deprecated.

thanks,

--Jeff
creator: jefft@apache.org
